name: Add Google Sheets rows for new Memberful subscriptions deactivated
description: Every time a new Memberful subscription is deactivated, Make will automatically add a Google Sheets row. Here's the [sheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1BZovPC488MA1S_LPr5NSka_sCriS2vLL5UIivuSRemE/edit?usp=sharing) used in this scenario.
